message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product for a price of $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering its immense value to you. I'm confident it will significantly benefit your business. Please let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,000,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your interest. While $1,000,000 is less than I hoped for, I'm willing to compromise.  I'm prepared to accept $1,100,000 for the product. This is a fair price that allows both of us to benefit from the deal.  Let me know if you're interested.
